import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cart', templateUrl: './cart.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cart.component.css'] }) export class CartComponent implements OnInit { cartProduct: any[] = []; ngOnInit(): void { this.getCart() } getCart() { this.cartProduct = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('cart')!); console.log(this.cartProduct) } }
